channel.title: Comments on: Should Government get involved with VCs ?

item.title: By: Irish Happenings « We Klik
item.dc:creator: Irish Happenings « We Klik
item.description: [...] the fund has €30m still waiting to be used. A recent FT article went out recently, to announce that they are looking for co-investment [...]
item.content:encoded: [...] the fund has €30m still waiting to be used. A recent FT article went out recently, to announce that they are looking for co-investment [...]

item.title: By: Derek Organ
item.dc:creator: Derek Organ
item.description: I guess the big questions is; Are these VC's making this money available now?
item.content:encoded: I guess the big questions is; Are these VC’s making this money available now?
